missionControl.title: Mission Control
missionControl.description: Consolidates live air quality, pollutant fingerprints and action recommendations for three scenarios into one dashboard.

description.current: Estimated commute risk from your current location

fingerprint.noPollutantData: No pollutant particles yet ‚Äî radar will show when data arrives.
fingerprint.title: Pollutant Fingerprint
fingerprint.timeSliderHint: Drag the time slider to inspect pollutant fingerprint across hours. Reserved for TEMPO high-res analysis.
fingerprint.description: Compare current pollutant fingerprint with future windows to identify the most harmful pollutants.

share.title: Skies Action Advice
share.message: NASA EarthData predicts {cityName} {pollutantLabel}PM2.5 will increase {windowText}! Check: {url}{mayorText} #CleanSkyNow #SpaceApps

actionHud.title: ‚ö° Action Risk HUD
actionHud.description: Decision Engine L1 converts into three actionable recommendations. CTAs can be added to reminders.
actionHud.noData: Unable to fetch action recommendations. Try again later.
actionHud.missingData: Air quality data not available yet.

map.apiKeyErrorMessage: Google Maps API key not set. Please set the environment variable.

countdown.sharePrompt: Share action recommendations to get more people involved.
countdown.withWindow: Goal: get more people to see the action advice before {time}.

selection.origin: Click map to pick an origin.
selection.destination: Click again to pick destination; drag to adjust.

commuteZone.title: Commute zone tiers
commuteZone.description: Three concentric rings centered on your location; inner rings represent higher risk and map to safety colors.
commuteZone.footer: Updated every 10 minutes; sampling current stations and caching for TEMPO.

office.label: Office ¬∑ Q7 ‚Üí City Hall

parent.label: Family ¬∑ Beitun ‚Üí Museum
parent.description: Beitun Children's Park to National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts

scenario.title: Scenario Studio
scenario.description: Generate 24h activity scripts that combine place info and AQI forecasts with AI-driven advice

pickLocation.title: Pick scenario location
pickLocation.hint: Click on the map to select the place to generate a scenario; you can reselect multiple times.

commuteGuardian.title: üöá Commute Guardian
commuteGuardian.description: Compare commute routes by distance, time, and air quality risk to surface real-time actions.
commuteGuardian.noRouteData: No route data available right now. Please refresh later.

quick.title: Quick scenario templates
quick.hint: Pick a point on the map to enable quick generation.

form.customSubtitle: Select a map location and activity type to generate a tailored script.
form.locationPlaceholder: Click the map to choose a location

disclaimer.line1: Insights rely on Google Air Quality forecasts and Decision Engine L1 guidance.
disclaimer.line2: Cross-check with live monitoring and adjust to personal health conditions.

scenarioStudio.emptyState: Pick an activity type to start your scenario
